name: CreateAssetType
description:
Create a new asset type in Freshservice.

Use this tool to create a new asset type in Freshservice when setting up or managing assets. It automates the process of defining asset categories in the system.

parameters.name: asset_type_name
parameters.description: The name of the asset type to be created.

parameters.name: asset_type_id
parameters.description: Unique identifier for the asset type to be created.

value_schema.description: Unique identifier of the asset type

parameters.name: asset_description_html
parameters.description: Provide a short description of the asset type in HTML format for styling.

value_schema.description: Short description of the asset type in HTML format

parameters.name: asset_type_plain_text_description
parameters.description: Short description of the asset type in plain text format without HTML tags.

value_schema.description: Short description of the asset type in plain text format

parameters.name: parent_asset_type_identifier
parameters.description: Unique identifier of the parent asset type. Use this to specify a hierarchy when creating a new asset type.

value_schema.description: Unique identifier of the parent asset type
